title: Coronavirus: Florida beaches will close for July Fourth as more states slow or reverse openings
description: More than 23,000 people in Florida tested positive for coronavirus in three days. Nationwide, cases are rising in 29 states, 11 of them by more than 100 percent in the last two weeks.
source.name: NBC News

author: Andrea Cavallier
title: School teacher who self-quarantined at Connecticut home for three weeks vanishes after going for a walk in early May
description: Gil Cunha was last seen just after midnight on May 7, 2020, at his parents’ home on Overlook Avenue in West Haven, Connecticut. Later that morning, Gil’s parents figured he was out for one of his daily walks. He never returned. Gil had been self-quarantining …
content:
Nearly eight weeks have passed since a beloved Connecticut school teacher disappeared in the early morning hours of his 50th birthday on May 7, 2020, and family members are worried sick.
